FuncDef: This command monitors policer statistics in an ingress FP queue group.
CLIs: card <slot-number> fp <fp-number> ingress { access | network } queue-group <queue-group-name> instance <instance-id> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] policer <policer-id> [ absolute | percent-rate | <reference-rate> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the slot number associated with the queue group, expressed as an integer. Values-1 to 10.
Specifies the FP number associated with the queue group, expressed as an integer. Values-1 to 8.
Displays policer statistics applied on the ingress FP.
Displays policer statistics on the FP access.
Displays policer statistics on the FP network.
Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Specifies the policer ID; must exist within the queue-group template applied to the ingress context of the forwarding plane. Values-1 to 32.
Displays Raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic based on the reference rate of 10G. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic as a percentage based on the reference rate specified. Values-100M, 1G, 10G, 40G, 100G, 400G. ParamDefault: Default- 10G
